title: How likely is it for a civil war to start in America during the COVID-19 pandemic? Could it happen? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: If Trump thinks he can drag America back to the Sixties and restart the white supremacy movement then he is in for the biggest shock of his sad life. Covid 19 has savaged Black America and the health compromised, there is simmering anger just under the surface. Trump wants to force the people back to work for a reason. Firstly it is cheaper to subject the Covid 19 target affected population to the virus and let natural attrition take its course. These people cost the system, is there strategy. The Military May take a very “dim” view of taking action on its citizens. Not to mention the black element of the forces. This could be Trumps Waterloo.

Trump will do pretty much anything to win an election. If that means a “Civil” War, that’s what you get. Ideally the war is short - with those for right against Trump. But sadly the Liar in Chief serves and group of supporters that are a very insecure and under educated electorate whose buttons he finds are easy to push. Could they muster their guns and attack their neighbors to “protect da Pressydent”. Who knows.
